CustomField.description: Indicator to show where the address on an ACCT record came from. M = Name Mailing Record P = Primary Name Record
CustomField.formula: CASE( Mailing_Address_From__c, 'M', 'Name Mailing Record', 'P', 'Primary Name Record', '')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If found, the address on an ACCT record will come from the"Name Mailing Record". If not found the address will come from the "Primary Name Record".
CustomField.label: Mailing Address From
